item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, January 23, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI spars with Elon Musk over $500bn Stargate project
2. Trump tells Putin to reach Ukraine ‘deal’ soon or US will increase sanctions
3. [Opinion] The strange liberal nonchalance about Trump’s return
4. Musk warned Reform UK donation might be difficult after joining Trump administration
5. Russian spy ship found ‘gathering intelligence’ in UK waters
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, January 23, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
